remarks: Lemma for ~ tchcph .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Oct-2015.)
statement:
tchval.n $e |- G = ( toCHil ` W ) $.
tchcph.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
tchcph.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
tchcph.1 $e |- ( ph -> W e. PreHil ) $.
tchcph.2 $e |- ( ph -> F = ( CCfld |`s K ) ) $.
tchclm $p |- ( ph -> W e. CMod ) $.
